Olayiwola Olasunkanmi Razaq, popularly known as Ojopagogo, is a respected Nigerian actor and television host who is also recognized for his filmmaking skills.

His wife is Nigerian actress Mojii Afolayan.

Olayiwola Olasunkanmi Razaq, also known as Ojopagogo, is a well-known Nigerian actor and television host.

He was born in rural Iseyin, Oyo State on September 30, 1964. Information about his parents and siblings is not yet public. Therefore, details of his early life are still to be revealed.

Profession

Rasaq Olayiwola, also known as Ojopagogo, has had a colourful and successful career in the Nigerian entertainment industry.

Known for his versatility, he has showcased his acting skills in several Yoruba films since the late 1980s, impressing audiences with his ability to effectively portray a wide range of characters in both comedic and serious roles.

Ochopagogo is known for his excellent comedic skills. He has won the hearts of Yoruba moviegoers with his perfect timing and easygoing humor.

In addition to acting, Ochopagogo has also tried his hand at directing, directing a number of Yoruba films that showcase his unique narrative style and creative vision.

Ojopagogo also ventured into film production, lending his knowledge and abilities to the success of several Yoruba film projects.

Ochopagogo is recognized and respected for the significant impact he has made on the Nigerian entertainment industry throughout his career. He is well respected by his colleagues and has amassed a loyal following who appreciate his skills and hard work.

Ochopagogo’s career reflects his love for storytelling and his determination to captivate audiences with his acting skills. He remains a key figure in the Yoruba film industry and has left a lasting impact on the Nigerian entertainment industry.

Rasak Olayiwola, stage name Ojopagogo, is married to actress Mogie Afolayan. They met on the sets of a movie 15 years ago and tied the knot in December 2004.

Although the couple remain private, they revealed that their strong faith has played a key role in their enduring marriage. They are parents to three children.
